Smart Wardrobe: Style & Try-On - Full App Function Map
Generated: 2026-02-06

Repository packages:
- react-native/ (main React Native + Expo app)
- functions/ (Firebase Cloud Functions backend)
- vto-pipeline/ (FastAPI VTO pipeline server)
- mcp-server/ (OAuth/MCP server)
- app/ (native Android scaffold, mostly empty)

App entry points:
- react-native/App.tsx
- react-native/index.js
- react-native/index.web.tsx
- react-native/src/navigation.tsx (RootStack + auth routing + deep-link handoff)

Navigation routes (route -> component -> file):
- Welcome -> WelcomeScreen -> react-native/src/screens/WelcomeScreen.tsx
- Auth -> AuthScreen -> react-native/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx
- Onboarding -> OnboardingScreen -> react-native/src/screens/OnboardingScreen.tsx
- OnboardingDetails -> OnboardingDetailsScreen -> react-native/src/screens/OnboardingDetailsScreen.tsx
- OnboardingHelp -> OnboardingHelpScreen -> react-native/src/screens/OnboardingHelpScreen.tsx
- Home -> HomeScreen -> react-native/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx
- Dashboard -> DashboardScreen -> react-native/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx
- Wardrobe -> WardrobeScreen -> react-native/src/screens/WardrobeScreen.tsx

Client exports (services/firebase/lib/utils):
Section: Client services
- react-native/src/services/affiliateService.ts :: convertShopItemToWardrobe, COSMETIC_AFFILIATES, getAffiliateLinkForPersona, getShopItemForCategory, getShopItemsForCategory, resolveAffiliateImageUrl
- react-native/src/services/ai/aiService.ts :: AIService
- react-native/src/services/ai/ImageEncoder.ts :: ImageEncoder
- react-native/src/services/aiStylist.ts :: buildCuratedOutfitBlueprint, chatWithStylist, generateItemImage, getItemCombinations, getOutfitDescriptionFromItems, getOutfitOfTheDay, getStyleOutfitIdeas
- react-native/src/services/capsuleBuilder.ts :: analyseCapsule, buildCapsulePlan, listOccasions, listPersonas
- react-native/src/services/colorAnalyzer.ts :: analyzeImage
- react-native/src/services/garmentKnowledge.ts :: buildPatternSummary, getGarmentConstructionSteps
- react-native/src/services/globalItemTags.ts :: loadGlobalItemTags, mergeGlobalItemTags, setGlobalItemTags
- react-native/src/services/handoff.ts :: consumePendingHandoffCode, getHandoffCodeFromUrl, getLastHandoffPayload, redeemHandoffCode, saveHandoffPayload, storePendingHandoffCode
- react-native/src/services/imageClassifier.native.ts :: classifyImage, classifyImageWithDetails, loadModel
- react-native/src/services/imageClassifier.web.ts :: classifyImage, classifyImageWithDetails, loadModel
- react-native/src/services/imageService.ts :: extractImageMetadata, getColorName
- react-native/src/services/learningHub.ts :: ensureLessonProgress, getLearningTopics, loadLearningProgress, saveLearningProgress
- react-native/src/services/learningReminders.native.ts :: syncLearningReminders
- react-native/src/services/learningReminders.web.ts :: syncLearningReminders
- react-native/src/services/OutfitScorer.native.ts :: initModel, scoreOutfit
- react-native/src/services/OutfitScorer.web.ts :: initModel, scoreOutfit
- react-native/src/services/patternGenerator.ts :: generatePattern
- react-native/src/services/preferences.ts :: buildItemMetadataFromProfile, getStyleProfile, saveStyleProfile
- react-native/src/services/recommendationService.ts :: generateOutfitForGoal, generateOutfitForMood, generateSuggestedLook, MOODS
- react-native/src/services/selfieReminders.native.ts :: cancelAllSelfieReminders, getSelfieReminderTime, requestNotificationPermissions, scheduleDailySelfieReminder
- react-native/src/services/selfieReminders.web.ts :: cancelAllSelfieReminders, getSelfieReminderTime, requestNotificationPermissions, scheduleDailySelfieReminder
- react-native/src/services/shoppingRecommendations.ts :: inferCategory, suggestionsFromCapsuleSlots, suggestionsFromDetox, suggestionsFromTravelItems
- react-native/src/services/shoppingState.ts :: applyShoppingAction, loadShoppingState, persistShoppingState, reduceShoppingState
- react-native/src/services/stripeService.ts :: createStripeCheckoutSession, createStripeSubscription, getTryOnStatus, recordTryOnUsage
- react-native/src/services/styleAdvisor.ts :: getStyleRecommendation
- react-native/src/services/styleRecommendations.ts :: buildStyleRecommendations
- react-native/src/services/subscriptionService.ts :: getTryOnUsage, getUserPlan
- react-native/src/services/sustainabilityService.ts :: calculateMetrics
- react-native/src/services/tagOwnership.ts :: loadGlobalTagOwners, loadUserTagOwners, setGlobalTagOwner, setUserTagOwner
- react-native/src/services/travelPacker.ts :: buildTravelPackingPlan
- react-native/src/services/vtoService.ts :: pollVTOStatus, startVirtualTryOn, startVirtualTryOnFull, VTO_CAPS, VTO_CONFIG
- react-native/src/services/wardrobeDetox.ts :: analyseWardrobeForDetox
- react-native/src/services/wardrobeStorage.ts :: addCustomOccasion, deleteCustomOccasion, deleteOutfit, deleteWardrobeItem, getActiveMissions, getCustomOccasions, getFavoriteOutfits, getNextWardrobeId, getSavedOutfits, getWardrobeItems, markItemAsWorn, removeMission, saveOutfit, setWardrobeItems, startMission, updateCustomOccasion, updateOutfitFavorite, updateOutfitItems, upsertWardrobeItem
Section: Firebase client
- react-native/src/firebase/auth.native.ts :: onAuthChange, registerEmail, signInApple, signInEmail, signInGoogle, signOutUser
- react-native/src/firebase/auth.web.ts :: onAuthChange, registerEmail, signInApple, signInEmail, signInGoogle, signOutUser
- react-native/src/firebase/functions.native.ts :: removeBackground
- react-native/src/firebase/functions.web.ts :: removeBackground
- react-native/src/firebase/userProfile.ts :: getUserOnboarded, getUserProfile, isUserProfileComplete, saveOnboarding, updateUserProfile
Section: Client libs
- react-native/src/lib/firebase.ts :: app, auth, db
- react-native/src/lib/stripe.native.tsx :: StripeProviderSafe, useStripeSafe
- react-native/src/lib/stripe.web.tsx :: StripeProviderSafe, useStripeSafe
Section: Client utils
- react-native/src/utils/i18n.ts :: getLang, i18n, setLang
- react-native/src/utils/imagePicker.native.ts :: pickImageViaCamera, pickImageViaFile, pickMultipleImagesViaFile
- react-native/src/utils/imagePicker.ts :: (no exports detected)
- react-native/src/utils/imagePicker.web.ts :: pickImageViaCamera, pickImageViaFile, pickMultipleImagesViaFile

Backend - Firebase Cloud Functions (functions/index.js):
- classifyClothingHttp
- createStripeCheckoutSession
- createStripeSubscription
- getTryOnStatus
- pollVTO
- processVTO
- processVTOFull
- recordTryOnUsage
- removeBg
- removeBgHttp
- segmentClothesV2
- stripeWebhook

Backend - VTO pipeline API (vto-pipeline/api_server.py):
- POST /pollVTO
- POST /processVTOFull

Backend - MCP server routes (mcp-server/index.js):
- GET /
- GET /.well-known/oauth-authorization-server
- GET /healthz
- GET /oauth/authorize
- POST /oauth/authorize/complete
- POST /oauth/revoke
- POST /oauth/token

Notes:
- This map lists exported symbols for client modules and public backend endpoints.
- For per-file internal helpers, open the file directly.
